contentList.content: Soothing songs endlessly play deep within the minds of all Dantalidrin, having familiarity as their own heartbeat. Dantalidrin are musically tethered beings with ever-changing appearances. Bound to Lower Planes by their bloodline, the ultimate forbidden secret that eludes their kind still. Their innate nature beckons them to uncover and collect forbidden knowledge, being the source of their wanderlust.
